Text: Canobie Lake:  It is approximately 1.5 mi long, and on average 0.4 mi wide, though two arms of the lake combine to produce a width of 1 mi at the lake's center.

Text: Canobie Lake:  Canobie Lake Park, an amusement park, is located on the lake's east shore.

Text: Canobie Lake:  The lake is the water supply for the town of Salem, New Hampshire.
